titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 with respect to the treatment of certain personal care services under the unemployment tax.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 2/2/1999--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude certain domestic services providing personal attendance, companionship, or household care from the unemployment tax.
